Header.title: Swiss-German Institute
Header.paragraph: Excellence Award for Your Online Business Reputation

Awards.title: Online Reputation
Awards.description: Strengthen the credibility of your brand online and positively influence purchase decisions. Review your online public perception of your brand, address any negative feedback which might damage your reputation or increase the dominant positioning of your operations online.

Awards.title: Customer Excellence
Awards.description: Boost your excellence in the eyes of your customers. Have a team who embodies business acumen; has product/service knowledge, strong problem-solving and time management skills, and a friendly attitude. Award your accomplishments in the customer excellence area.

Awards.title: Digital Community Engagement
Awards.description: Engaging your community is the primary way to build a bigger business and gain new customers. Reviewing your online presence and rating your community engagement is of a pivotal importance today.

Awards.title: Corporate Social Responsibility
Awards.description: Be accountable for yourself, your stakeholders and the public by enhancing society and the environment, raising morale at the workplace, and promoting a positive brand. We would like to thank and honor your environmental, ethical, economic, and philanthropic endeavors.

Awards.title: Happiness at Work
Awards.description: Empower your talent. Happiness at work is one of the major sources of positive outcomes in the workplace and a pathway to business success. With SGI’s sophisticated assessment system, identify the risk stress factor at your office and find strategies for improvement.
benefits: Promote happy and friendly work environment

Mission.title: Our Mission
Mission.text: Our mission is to drive the global online business excellence and help organizations achieve happy and healthy client employee connectedness.

Mission.title: Our Vision
Mission.text: Becoming the leading global awarding institute by promoting highest standards and raising capabilities in reputation management, customer excellence, and employee happiness.

About.paragraph: Swiss-German Institute was founded on the grounds of promoting and protecting company’s brand so it can be discovered, followed, recommended and even defended in a predominantly digital marketplace. SGI helps organizations globally ensure they manage their online reputation management right. Initially founded in Switzerland, with headquarters moved to Germany, SGI’s cause spans internationally; helping organizations improve their online reputation, brand management, customer service excellence, corporate social responsibility and happiness at work. SGI’s awarding criteria guides organizations on the right path to global reputation and customer service excellence.
